img.alt: Fairmont raised $88,000 this year to support the Kettering Backpack Program, Clothes That Work and Special Wish.

div.div: In the 35 Years of Spirit Chain Competition between Fairmont and Centerville, the two schools have raised more than $2.5 million!

School buildings
in the
Kettering City School District

strong.span: The mission of the Kettering City Schools, in partnership with the family and community, is to guarantee a superior educational experience for all students by providing a positive and innovative learning environment, while responsibly utilizing our resources.

span.p: Regular updates ofnews and information pertaining to the district's response to the COVID-19 pandemic will be posted here -- WEDNESDAY, APRIL 22, 2020 -- FAIRMONT HIGH SCHOOL PRINCIPAL, TYLER ALEXANDER, ANNOUNCES NEW DATE FOR GRADUATION.

div.a: Read More about KCS'S COVID-19 UPDATES

img.alt: KCS-City of Kettering Yout and Family Community Resource Coordinator

span.p: Please use this guide, prepared by KCS/City of KetteringYouth & Family Community Resource Coordinator Jonelle Carroll, to access community resources that may be helpful to you during these challengingtimes.

span.p: Please support the many restaurants who support our students and schools!

MESSAGE FROM SUPT. INSKEEP -- REMOTE LEARNING TO CONTINUE THROUGH END OF SCHOOL YEAR

img.alt: Message from Kettering City Schools Superintendent

span.p: KCS Families and Community -- On Monday, April 20, Governor DeWine and Dr. Acton announced that Ohio schools will continue remote learning through the end of the school year.

div.a: Read More about MESSAGE FROM SUPT. INSKEEP -- REMOTE LEARNING TO CONTINUE THROUGH END OF SCHOOL YEAR

img.alt: Technology Help Desk Call-Line Established at 937-499-2626

span.p: A Technology Help Desk Call-Line has been established at 937-499-2626.

div.a: Read More about TECHNOLOGY HELP DESK CALL-LINE ESTABLISHED
Central Registration to Operate Remotely During COVID-19 Crisis

span.p: The Kettering City Schools Central Enrollment Department will continue to serve our current and new families remotely as we adhere to mandated school closures and CDC recommendations relative to the COVID-19 crisis.

div.a: Read More about Central Registration to Operate Remotely During COVID-19 Crisis

span.p: Firebird Families, Spectrum isoffering FREE broadband and WiFi to students without it. Check out the link below for details and how to sign up.

div.a: Read More about Spectrum to Offer FREE WiFi

span.p: In his March blog, Superintendent Scott Inskeep focuses on the importance of a strong partnership between the family and communityto assure student success.

div.a: Read More about Inside Kettering with Inskeep...Blog

'Faces of Kettering' Spotlights Strategic Plan Focus Areas

span.p: The district's Strategic Plan, "A Blueprint for Student Success,"will guide the work of our school district in both day-to-day operations and in our long-term goals and objectives.

div.a: Read More about 'Faces of Kettering' Spotlights Strategic Plan Focus Areas

span.p: Fairmont High School's United Student Body (USB) is a busy group of young people who make service and giving back to their peers and their community a priority. Join Superintendent Inskeep as he chats with USB advisor, Corey Miller, and members of the USB.

div.a: Read More about Inside Kettering with Inskeep...Podcast
